Please approve the campaign Ad ID:1937185886376341506

I can't directly approve campaigns, but I can help you with the process. If your ad is pending due to business verification, please provide the following details:

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once you have this information, please email it to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. Our team will review and update you on your account status.
